basics.name: Adebayo Braimah
basics.label: PhD Student in Computer Science
basics.summary: PhD student specializing in explainable artificial intelligence (XAI), explainable reinforcement learning (XRL), and the explainability of large language models (LLMs).

work.name: Griffiss Institute, AFRL Information Directorate
work.summary: Conducted research on explainability of machine learning models using loss landscape analysis under the supervision of Prof. Yifan Sun and Dr. Walter Bennette.
highlights: Collaborated on cutting-edge explainable AI projects at AFRL.

work.name: Stony Brook University
work.summary: Focused on profiling eigenspectrum decomposition methods for large matrices under Prof. Yifan Sun.
highlights: Applied advanced eigenspectrum decomposition techniques to analyze neural networks.

work.name: Cincinnati Childrenâ€™s Hospital Medical Center
work.summary: Analyzed functional and structural connectivity in pediatric neuroimaging projects.
highlights: Developed imaging solutions for neonatal hypoxic ischemic encephalopathy and ADHD studies.

awards.title: NDSEG Fellowship
awards.summary: Covers tuition, stipend, and fees for doctoral studies.
